breeds.name: Dragon Li
breeds.description: The Dragon Li is loyal, but not particularly affectionate. They are known to be very intelligent, and their natural breed status means that they're very active. She is is gentle with people, and has a reputation as a talented hunter of rats and other vermin.
breeds.alt_names: Chinese Lia Hua, Lí hua māo (貍花貓), Li Hua
